participant_1.background:

i like to build things.
my favorite band is the avert brother.

participant_2.background:

my dad works in the automotive industry.
I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.
i do not like wearing pants when i do not have to.
on weekends i like to go hiking.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Hey, not bad! Just got back from a hike. What have you been up to today?
I've been working on a short film. I'm excited to share it with my friends soon.
That's awesome! Do you post your short films online? I'd love to see it.
I haven't decided yet. I'm still working on it, and I want to make sure it's perfect before I share it with the world.
Well I hope you post it soon! I'm sure it's great.
Thanks! I'm excited to share it when it's finished.
What kind of film are you working on?
It's a short comedy about a group of friends who go on a camping trip.
Sounds fun! I love camping. Do you go often?
Not as often as I'd like to. But I love being in the outdoors.
Same here! I love the fresh air and the exercise.
Me too! And I love being able to disconnect from technology and just enjoy nature.
So what's your favorite part of the outdoors?
I love being able to see the stars at night
